snippet.title: Shadow Under The Cowl | Hunt: Showdown
snippet.description:
The Shadow Under the Cowl—Out Now!

This DLC contains:
- The Cowl (New Hunter)
- Rib Burster (Springfield M1892 Krag Bayonet)
- Eye Taker (Hunting Bow)
- Swarm Cutter (Throwing Knives)

Take up the mantle, become The Cowl.

http://tinyurl.com/ShadowCowlYT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Get Hunt Showdown on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/HuntSteamYouTube

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/huntshowdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntshowdown
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/crytek
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@huntshowdownofficial
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/huntshowdown

#HuntShowdown #Hunt
